# AVCaptureDevice.SystemUserInterface.microphoneModes

**Case**

The system user interface for selecting microphone modes.

## Declaration

```swift
case microphoneModes
```

## User interfaces

- **AVCaptureDevice.SystemUserInterface.videoEffects**: The system user interface for changing the state of video effects.
